backburner.header.title: Backlog
backburner.config.commandRoot.tooltip: THIS REQUIRES A RESTART TO TAKE EFFECT
backburner.config.hudScale.tooltip: Scales the backlog's GUI Scale in relation to the vanilla HUD
backburner.config.hudScale.fractional.to:
When disabled, the effective GUI Scale will be snapped to the closest integer.
Fractional scales may not look good without other mods such as "Advanced UI Scale"
